job.title: GCP Data Engineer
job.description: Hi Professionals..,<br><br>I am looking to hire # GCP Data Engineer #position.<br><br>Please find the below Job Description and share me the feedback if you are interested. Client:Macys<br><br>Implementation:Infosys Job Title:GCP Data Engineer<br><br>Work Location: Atlanta, GA<br><br>Duraton:06 Months<br><br><strong><u>Must Have Skills All Are Required<br><br></u></strong>GCP<br><br><strong><u>Python Detailed Job Description<br><br></u></strong>Candidate must be located within commuting distance of Atlanta, GA or be willing to relocate to the area.<br><br>7 years of experience with Information Technology and Data engineering.<br><br>3 years of experience in Big Data on Big Data, Python, Scala, Spark Big Data, Scala and spark<br><br><strong>Thanks &amp; Regards<br><br></strong><strong>Chinni Veladri<br><br></strong><strong>SoftHQ Inc - Technical Recruiter<br><br>Direct: 618-360-5859<br><br>E-mail: veladri@softhq.com</strong>
